item.constructsarmory.material_armor_hel: The Helmet is a piece of armor that protects your head.
item.constructsarmory.material_armor_che: The Chestplate is a piece of armor that protects your torso.
item.constructsarmory.material_armor_leg: The Leggings are pieces of armor that protect your legs.
item.constructsarmory.material_armor_boo: The Boots are pieces of armor that protect your feet.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.durability.de:
The base-value for durability calculations.
Listed in order by slot: head, chest, legs, feet.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.armor.descrip:
How much this protects you when worn.
Listed in order by slot: head, chest, legs, feet.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.movement_spee: How much speed this gives you when worn.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.mail.durabili: The total durability of the armor will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.mail.armor.de: The total armor value of the armor will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.constructsarmory.mail.movement: The total movement speed bonus of the armor will be multiplied by this.
modifier.constructsarmory.cultivated.des: Armor practically grows more material when repairing
modifier.constructsarmory.woven.descript: Increased movement speed as it wears out, but less armor
modifier.constructsarmory.splintered.des: Sometimes damages attackers, increasing damage when at lower durability
modifier.constructsarmory.irregular.flav: §oThe quality of this product is problematic!
modifier.constructsarmory.irregular.desc: Armor is lower lasting, less armor, but there's a chance of immunity to attacks.
modifier.constructsarmory.delving.descri: Increased movement speed the deeper you go
modifier.constructsarmory.igneous.descri: Increased protection in hot areas, but decreased protection in cold ones
modifier.constructsarmory.bloodletting.d: Sometimes damages attackers, increasing damage when the wearer is attacked
modifier.constructsarmory.malignant.desc: Sometimes damages attackers, increasing damage when the wearer deals damage
modifier.constructsarmory.aerial.descrip: Increased movement speed at high elevations
modifier.constructsarmory.dense.descript: Armor lasts longer, but is harder to repair
modifier.constructsarmory.weighty.descri: Increased protection when your movement speed is lower
modifier.constructsarmory.radiant.flavor: §oSpeed from light, not speed of light
modifier.constructsarmory.radiant.descri: Increased movement speed in brighter areas
modifier.constructsarmory.shielding.desc: Decreases negative effects and increases positive effects
modifier.constructsarmory.stoneguard.des: Picking up stone protects the armor from future damage
modifier.constructsarmory.overcast.descr: Overslime can be made extra thick on this armor
modifier.constructsarmory.nimble.descrip: Armor is incredibly light for its size, allowing you to move faster
modifier.constructsarmory.immaculate.des: Increased movement speed when at higher durability
modifier.constructsarmory.savory.descrip: Taking damage sometimes shaves a little bacon off
modifier.constructsarmory.prickly.descri: Sometimes causes attackers to bleed and suffer additional damage
modifier.constructsarmory.scorn.descript: The damage from attackers without tools to you is reduced.
modifier.constructsarmory.ductile.descri: Armor is longer lasting, boosts speed more, and protects more
modifier.constructsarmory.immaculate_2.d: Increased movement speed when at higher durability
modifier.constructsarmory.fervent.descri: Increased movement speed in extreme temperatures
modifier.constructsarmory.blighted.descr: Sometimes withers attackers away, but may also cause the wearer to wither
modifier.constructsarmory.experienced.de: Gain bonus XP from killing mobs and mining blocks
modifier.constructsarmory.overworked.des: Increases amount of overslime restored from all sources
modifier.constructsarmory.overlord.descr: Armor takes some of the durability as new overslime subjects
modifier.constructsarmory.vengeful.descr: Increases protection the more that you're damaged
modifier.constructsarmory.acceleration.d: Your speed continues to increase as long as you keep sprinting
modifier.constructsarmory.salvaged.descr: Increased movement speed when at lower durability
modifier.constructsarmory.endershield.de: Armor sometimes teleports the wearer when damaged
